humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, one sentinel lymph node was assessed and it was negative for carcinoma (0/1). Based on the new rules 10 and 11, N0 indicates no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that one sentinel lymph node was removed and found to be negative for carcinoma (0/1). Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
